entry.title: Doctor Who 12x01 "Spyfall (1)"
entry.summary: When intelligence agents around the world are under attack from alien forces, MI6 turns to the only people who can help: the Doctor and friends. As they travel the globe looking for answers, attacks come from all sides. Earth’s security rests on the team's shoulders, but where will this planet-threatening conspiracy lead them?
entry.content: When intelligence agents around the world are under attack from alien forces, MI6 turns to the only people who can help: the Doctor and friends. As they travel the globe looking for answers, attacks come from all sides. Earth’s security rests on the team's shoulders, but where will this planet-threatening conspiracy lead them?

entry.title: QI 17x09 "Quizmas"
entry.summary: Sandi Toksvig hosts the seasonal quizmas quiz, with Alan Davies, Sara Pascoe, Johnny Vegas and Josh Widdicombe.
entry.content: Sandi Toksvig hosts the seasonal quizmas quiz, with Alan Davies, Sara Pascoe, Johnny Vegas and Josh Widdicombe.

entry.title: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker (2019)
entry.summary: The surviving Resistance faces the First Order once again as the journey of Rey, Finn and Poe Dameron continues. With the power and knowledge of generations behind them, the final battle begins.
entry.content: The surviving Resistance faces the First Order once again as the journey of Rey, Finn and Poe Dameron continues. With the power and knowledge of generations behind them, the final battle begins.

entry.title: Letterkenny 8x01 "Miss Fire"
entry.summary: The Hicks support Wayne. Reilly and Jonesy continue the hunt for the big ship. Stewart has made some changes.
entry.content: The Hicks support Wayne. Reilly and Jonesy continue the hunt for the big ship. Stewart has made some changes.

entry.title: Killjoys 5x01 "Run, Yala, Run"
entry.summary: Dutch realizes The Lady has put Westerley under a collective delusion and in a world without memory, nothing is what it seems.
entry.content: Dutch realizes The Lady has put Westerley under a collective delusion and in a world without memory, nothing is what it seems.

entry.title: Magic for Humans 2x06 "Time is Relative"
entry.summary: Justin turns water into mead at the Renaissance fair and speed-knits a sweater before slowing down to share magical memories with his mother.
entry.content: Justin turns water into mead at the Renaissance fair and speed-knits a sweater before slowing down to share magical memories with his mother.

entry.title: Magic for Humans 2x05 "All Work and No Play"
entry.summary: After telecommuting via a handy TaskRabbit helper, Justin amazes kids with tricks for skipping chores and performs a feat of dazzling multitasking.
entry.content: After telecommuting via a handy TaskRabbit helper, Justin amazes kids with tricks for skipping chores and performs a feat of dazzling multitasking.

entry.title: Magic for Humans 2x04 "We Should Talk"
entry.summary: Communication is key as Justin plays language games in an ESL class and conducts psychic readings at a library. Plus: starstruck subliminal messages.
entry.content: Communication is key as Justin plays language games in an ESL class and conducts psychic readings at a library. Plus: starstruck subliminal messages.

entry.title: Magic for Humans 2x03 "Daddy Issues"
entry.summary: Between bad dad jokes, Justin pulls pranks with his son, awes parents with his uncanny childproofing and tests his reflexes against the LA Chargers.
entry.content: Between bad dad jokes, Justin pulls pranks with his son, awes parents with his uncanny childproofing and tests his reflexes against the LA Chargers.

entry.title: Magic for Humans 2x02 "Fake"
entry.summary: It's all about suspending disbelief when Justin links TV magic to pro wrestling, fools a lie detector and role-plays a fantasy mage in the park.
entry.content: It's all about suspending disbelief when Justin links TV magic to pro wrestling, fools a lie detector and role-plays a fantasy mage in the park.

entry.title: Magic for Humans 2x01 "Christmas"
entry.summary: Ho ho ho! Justin embraces the holiday spirit and visits Santa school, gets playful with Susan Sarandon and teaches kids about the magic of giving.
entry.content: Ho ho ho! Justin embraces the holiday spirit and visits Santa school, gets playful with Susan Sarandon and teaches kids about the magic of giving.

entry.title: Magic for Humans 1x06 "Love"
entry.summary: In this episode dedicated to romance, Justin helps a single guy get a date and delivers a surprise proposal to a woman who married herself.
entry.content: In this episode dedicated to romance, Justin helps a single guy get a date and delivers a surprise proposal to a woman who married herself.

entry.title: Magic for Humans 1x05 "Guilt Trip"
entry.summary: Oh, the guilt! Justin talks to moms about lying for a living. Later, he conducts an eyewitness experiment and amazes detention-stricken students.
entry.content: Oh, the guilt! Justin talks to moms about lying for a living. Later, he conducts an eyewitness experiment and amazes detention-stricken students.

entry.title: Magic for Humans 1x04 "Seeing Is Believing"
entry.summary: Justin attempts to convince people that invisibility, brain-enhancing medicines and superpowers are all real. (Spoiler alert: They're not!)
entry.content: Justin attempts to convince people that invisibility, brain-enhancing medicines and superpowers are all real. (Spoiler alert: They're not!)

entry.title: Magic for Humans 1x03 "Terrifying Tech"
entry.summary: It's man vs. machine as Justin squares off against a robot in a magic battle. Other topics include delivery drones, face yoga and virtual reality.
entry.content: It's man vs. machine as Justin squares off against a robot in a magic battle. Other topics include delivery drones, face yoga and virtual reality.

entry.title: Magic for Humans 1x02 "Express Yourself"
entry.summary: School uniforms. Latte art. LEGO sculptures. Justin tackles the surprisingly magical ways people choose to express themselves.
entry.content: School uniforms. Latte art. LEGO sculptures. Justin tackles the surprisingly magical ways people choose to express themselves.

entry.title: Magic for Humans 1x01 "Self-Control"
entry.summary: Justin explores the concepts of marshmallow self-control and why it's best just to go with the flow. Plus -- free fro-yo!

entry.title: Batwoman 1x09 "Crisis on Infinite Earths (2)"
entry.summary: The group uses Ray's invention to track new recruits to help save the universe. The Monitor sends Iris, Clark and Lois in search of a mysterious Kryptonian, while Kate and Kara head out to find Bruce Wayne. In addition, Mia challenges Sara, Rory discovers a hidden talent, and Lex Luthor returns.
entry.content: The group uses Ray's invention to track new recruits to help save the universe. The Monitor sends Iris, Clark and Lois in search of a mysterious Kryptonian, while Kate and Kara head out to find Bruce Wayne. In addition, Mia challenges Sara, Rory discovers a hidden talent, and Lex Luthor returns.

entry.title: Marvel's Runaways 2x13 "Split Up"
entry.summary: Angry at his betrayal, the Runaways meet with Chase. He offers them a choice: surrender to PRIDE or face the consequences. As the kids attempt their escape, they’re separated and forced to survive against an enemy far more pernicious than they expected.
entry.content: Angry at his betrayal, the Runaways meet with Chase. He offers them a choice: surrender to PRIDE or face the consequences. As the kids attempt their escape, they’re separated and forced to survive against an enemy far more pernicious than they expected.

entry.title: Marvel's Runaways 2x12 "Earth Angel"
entry.summary: Victor recruits Chase to intern at PRIDE to prove that they are nothing more than concerned parents, Chase is skeptical. Karolina discovers Frank is holding Leslie at a detention facility and tries to rescue her mom with Nico, Molly and Vaughn.
entry.content: Victor recruits Chase to intern at PRIDE to prove that they are nothing more than concerned parents, Chase is skeptical. Karolina discovers Frank is holding Leslie at a detention facility and tries to rescue her mom with Nico, Molly and Vaughn.

entry.title: Marvel's Runaways 2x11 "Last Waltz"
entry.summary: The Runaways are falling apart. Needing a break, they throw Molly a quinceanera. PRIDE ramps up their new arsenal. Frank puts Leslie in a facility to bring her back to the faith. Meanwhile, the mysterious voice Karolina has been hearing becomes real.
entry.content: The Runaways are falling apart. Needing a break, they throw Molly a quinceanera. PRIDE ramps up their new arsenal. Frank puts Leslie in a facility to bring her back to the faith. Meanwhile, the mysterious voice Karolina has been hearing becomes real.

entry.title: Marvel's Runaways 2x10 "Hostile Takeover"
entry.summary: Leslie starts dismantling the cult she helped create, but Frank has other plans. Awol uses Livvie as bait to confront the Runaways. The teens must protect Gert & Old Lace, who are sick, and Awol’s team storms the hostel. Victor doesn’t feel like himself.
entry.content: Leslie starts dismantling the cult she helped create, but Frank has other plans. Awol uses Livvie as bait to confront the Runaways. The teens must protect Gert & Old Lace, who are sick, and Awol’s team storms the hostel. Victor doesn’t feel like himself.

entry.title: Marvel's Runaways 2x09 "Big Shot"
entry.summary: The Runaways face off with PRIDE’S dirty cops, Flores and Awol. Against all objections, Alex blackmails Awol to help. But Awol refuses. PRIDE resolves to take the kids by force. Back at the Hostel, Karolina hears a mysterious voice.
entry.content: The Runaways face off with PRIDE’S dirty cops, Flores and Awol. Against all objections, Alex blackmails Awol to help. But Awol refuses. PRIDE resolves to take the kids by force. Back at the Hostel, Karolina hears a mysterious voice.

entry.title: Marvel's Runaways 2x08 "Past Life"
entry.summary: In the aftermath of the battle against Jonah, Karolina searches for answers about Jonah and the others help Alex and Livvie try to prove Darius’s innocence in Destiny’s murder. But Livvie’s curiosity just might catch up with her.
entry.content: In the aftermath of the battle against Jonah, Karolina searches for answers about Jonah and the others help Alex and Livvie try to prove Darius’s innocence in Destiny’s murder. But Livvie’s curiosity just might catch up with her.

entry.title: Marvel's Runaways 2x07 "Last Rites"
entry.summary: It’s time for the Runaways to stop Jonah, once and for all. But while the kids scramble to stall out Jonah’s plan, the parents unexpectedly arrive. Will PRIDE fight against their own kids or join their ranks against the powerful, and vengeful, Jonah?
entry.content: It’s time for the Runaways to stop Jonah, once and for all. But while the kids scramble to stall out Jonah’s plan, the parents unexpectedly arrive. Will PRIDE fight against their own kids or join their ranks against the powerful, and vengeful, Jonah?

entry.title: Watchmen 1x08 "A God Walks into Abar"
entry.summary: Angela's mysterious past in Vietnam is at last revealed.
entry.content: Angela's mysterious past in Vietnam is at last revealed.

entry.title: Watchmen 1x07 "An Almost Religious Awe"
entry.summary: Under Lady Trieu's care, Angela undergoes an unconventional treatment while Agent Blake chases down a lead. The Smartest Man in The World delivers a stunning defense of his past actions.
entry.content: Under Lady Trieu's care, Angela undergoes an unconventional treatment while Agent Blake chases down a lead. The Smartest Man in The World delivers a stunning defense of his past actions.

entry.title: Watchmen 1x06 "This Extraordinary Being"
entry.summary: Deep under the influence of Nostalgia, Angela gets a firsthand account of her grandfather's journey.
entry.content: Deep under the influence of Nostalgia, Angela gets a firsthand account of her grandfather's journey.

entry.title: Watchmen 1x05 "Little Fear of Lightning"
entry.summary: The origin story of Looking Glass is at last revealed, as is the truth behind the greatest hoax in American history. The Smartest Man In The World plots a daring escape.
entry.content: The origin story of Looking Glass is at last revealed, as is the truth behind the greatest hoax in American history. The Smartest Man In The World plots a daring escape.

entry.title: Watchmen 1x04 "If You Don't Like My Story, Write Your Own"
entry.summary: Reclusive trillionaire Lady Trieu finally enters the stage with a mysterious offer. With Blake getting closer to the truth of her coverup, Angela enlists Looking Glass for help. The Lord trains two new servants.
entry.content: Reclusive trillionaire Lady Trieu finally enters the stage with a mysterious offer. With Blake getting closer to the truth of her coverup, Angela enlists Looking Glass for help. The Lord trains two new servants.

entry.title: Watchmen 1x03 "She Was Killed by Space Junk"
entry.summary: Following a late-night visit from the Senator who authored Masked Policing Legislation in Oklahoma, FBI agent Laurie Blake heads to Tulsa to take over the recent murder investigation. The Lord of the Estate draws unwelcome attention.
entry.content: Following a late-night visit from the Senator who authored Masked Policing Legislation in Oklahoma, FBI agent Laurie Blake heads to Tulsa to take over the recent murder investigation. The Lord of the Estate draws unwelcome attention.

entry.title: Watchmen 1x02 "Martial Feats of Comanche Horsemanship"
entry.summary: As Angela relives haunting memories of an attack on her family, she detains a mysterious man who claims responsibility for Tulsa's most recent murder. An original play is performed for an audience of one.
entry.content: As Angela relives haunting memories of an attack on her family, she detains a mysterious man who claims responsibility for Tulsa's most recent murder. An original play is performed for an audience of one.

entry.title: Watchmen 1x01 "It's Summer and We're Running Out of Ice"
entry.summary: In an alternate America where police conceal their identities behind masks to protect themselves from a terrorist organization, Detective Angela Abar investigates the attempted murder of a fellow officer under the guidance of her friend and Chief, Judd Crawford. The Lord of a Country Estate receives an anniversary gift from his loyal servants.
entry.content: In an alternate America where police conceal their identities behind masks to protect themselves from a terrorist organization, Detective Angela Abar investigates the attempted murder of a fellow officer under the guidance of her friend and Chief, Judd Crawford. The Lord of a Country Estate receives an anniversary gift from his loyal servants.

entry.summary: The Mandalorian helps a rookie bounty hunter who is in over his head.

entry.title: Supergirl 5x09 "Crisis on Infinite Earths (1)"
entry.summary: The Monitor sends Harbinger to gather the worlds’ greatest heroes—Supergirl, The Flash, Green Arrow, Batwoman, White Canary, The Atom and Superman—in preparation for the impending Crisis. With their worlds in imminent danger, the superheroes suit up for battle. J’onn and Alex recruit Lena to help them find a way to save the people of Earth-38.

entry.title: Key & Peele 3x04 "Boarding Group One"
entry.summary: Threats at a boxing match press conference get a little strange, and a cop can't understand why everything around him is blowing up.
entry.content: Threats at a boxing match press conference get a little strange, and a cop can't understand why everything around him is blowing up.

entry.title: Horrible Histories Special 2 "Horrible Christmas"
entry.summary:
Christmas is a time for charity, hope and goodwill to all men - but for Horrible Histories it's a time of farting jesters, finding bacon in your Christmas card, and having your dinner confiscated by Oliver Cromwell.
This episode showcases bizarre Yuletide absurdities from over the centuries with a unique blend of sketches, pastiche and song - a foul and festive treat. Revel in the smelliest, silliest and goriest stories about everyone's favourite time of year.
entry.content: Christmas is a time for charity, hope and goodwill to all men - but for Horrible Histories it's a time of farting jesters, finding bacon in your Christmas card, and having your dinner confiscated by Oliver Cromwell. This episode showcases bizarre Yuletide absurdities from over the centuries with a unique blend of sketches, pastiche and song - a foul and festive treat. Revel in the smelliest, silliest and goriest stories about everyone's favourite time of year.

entry.summary: Jennifer Lopez hosts with musical guest DaBaby
entry.content: Jennifer Lopez hosts with musical guest DaBaby

entry.title: Bob's Burgers 10x10 "Have Yourself A Maily Linda Christmas"
entry.summary: Linda works a temp job at the post office to make extra money for the holidays. But when an important package goes undelivered, Linda breaks protocol and takes it upon herself to save the day. Meanwhile, Bob and Tina are trapped at home with Linda’s fussy family and Gene and Louise scramble last-minute to find the perfect gift for Tina.
entry.content: Linda works a temp job at the post office to make extra money for the holidays. But when an important package goes undelivered, Linda breaks protocol and takes it upon herself to save the day. Meanwhile, Bob and Tina are trapped at home with Linda’s fussy family and Gene and Louise scramble last-minute to find the perfect gift for Tina.

entry.title: The Expanse 4x10 "Cibola Burn"
entry.summary: Ashford closes in on an enemy while uncovering a dangerous plot. Avasarala faces a crossroads in her personal and political life. The Roci crew works to reestablish life on Ilus in the wake of a deadly catastrophe.
entry.content: Ashford closes in on an enemy while uncovering a dangerous plot. Avasarala faces a crossroads in her personal and political life. The Roci crew works to reestablish life on Ilus in the wake of a deadly catastrophe.

entry.title: The Expanse 4x09 "Saeculum"
entry.summary: Holden and Miller race to save Ilus. Murtry puts his endgame into motion, putting the Roci crew’s lives at risk.
entry.content: Holden and Miller race to save Ilus. Murtry puts his endgame into motion, putting the Roci crew’s lives at risk.

entry.title: The Expanse 4x08 "The One-Eyed Man"
entry.summary: Avasarala faces fallout for the UN’s military mission. Ashford and Drummer makes big decisions about their future within the OPA. A spreading illness on Ilus takes a toll on Amos. Alex and Naomi’s attempt to rescue the Barb turns desperate.

entry.content: Naomi and Alex work to keep the Barbapiccola in orbit amidst a power outage. Avasarala faces a tough decision. Holden and Elvi race to find a cure for a disease spreading on Ilus.

entry.summary: The Roci crew prepares for an incoming disaster on Ilus. Ashford and Drummer close in on an enemy within the Belt. Bobbie takes on a dangerous job.

entry.title: The Expanse 4x05 "Oppressor"

entry.title: The Expanse 4x03 "Subduction"
entry.summary: New alien threats emerge on Ilus as Naomi battles health challenges on the planet. Bobbie searches for a missing person on Mars. Avasarala faces a new challenge in the UN.
entry.content: New alien threats emerge on Ilus as Naomi battles health challenges on the planet. Bobbie searches for a missing person on Mars. Avasarala faces a new challenge in the UN.

entry.title: The Expanse 4x02 "Jetsam"
entry.summary: Avasarala is blindsided while on a visit to Mars. The Roci crew continue their protomolecule investigation while tensions between the RCE and Belters reach a tipping point. Drummer and Ashford track down a terrorist.
entry.content: Avasarala is blindsided while on a visit to Mars. The Roci crew continue their protomolecule investigation while tensions between the RCE and Belters reach a tipping point. Drummer and Ashford track down a terrorist.

entry.title: The Expanse 4x01 "New Terra"
entry.summary: The crew of the Roci investigates a strange protomolecule ruin on an alien planet. Bobbie copes with civilian life on Mars. Drummer and Ashford battle with piracy in the Belt.
